app-bar.subtitle: " Elegance on the stage, in decorous harmony. {'|'} 「红毹婵娟，庄谐并举」"

index.s0: (Translated) " How gently do the clouds and flowers sway, as dancing winds meander through the vales. {'|'} 「云婵娟来花婵娟，风流尽在山水间。」"
index.description: A HoYo game toolbox that open source on {0} .
